documentation.text: Mapping from user address to their identity
Event emitted when a new identity is added
Event emitted when an identity is updated
Event emitted when an identity is deleted
Event emitted when an identity is verified
Event emitted when an identity is revoked
Event emitted when an identity-related action is logged
@dev Deletes the identity of the caller.
@dev Verifies the identity of the caller.
@dev Revokes the verification of the identity of the caller.

@dev Logs an identity-related action.
 @param action The action to log.

addIdentity(string,string).details: Adds a new identity for the caller.

deleteIdentity().details: Deletes the identity of the caller.

getIdentity(address).details: Retrieves the identity of a given user.

isIdentityVerified(address).details: Checks if a given user's identity is verified.

returns._0: True if the user's identity is verified, false otherwise.

revokeIdentity().details: Revokes the verification of the identity of the caller.

updateIdentity(string,string).details: Updates the identity of the caller.

params._email: The new email of the user.
params._name: The new name of the user.

verifyIdentity().details: Verifies the identity of the caller.
